description: For his second time in front of the camera, Tanner shows up after having been to the gym just prior.  He's sporting his green silkies and dog tags and looking delicious.  He's all oiled up and ready to shower.  But before he does we get to spend some time admiring that body once more.  I must admit to getting a little artsy with this one, but give me a break.  I was in love. Chalk it up to my attempt to present something different.  I'm sure you're gonna be equally in love with tanner as you watch him strip down to a hot black jockstrap, showing off that nice fuzzy butt covered in light blonde hair. and giving us a front row seat to what must be one of the most insanely gorgeous asses on the planet.  If you've ever had a thing for watching guys in the shower, you'll be painting your own masterpiece of Tanner as you watch.
title: Tanner 2
